description: '''Electropop''' is a [[popular music]] [[fusion genre]]  combining elements of the [[Electronic music|electronic]] and [[Pop music|pop]] styles. It has been described as a variant of [[synth-pop]] with emphasis on a hard electronic sound.{{sfn|Jones|2006|p=107}} The genre was developed in the 1980s and saw a [[1980s retro|revival of popularity and influence]] in the late 2000s. The genre is often confused with [[Electro (music)|electro]], which is sometimes called electro-pop. However, electro is a separate genre incorporating [[funk]] and early [[Hip-hop|hip hop]].
